sudoku.cs
Class ClientModel

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              sudoku.cs.ClientModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, Client
public class ClientModel
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements Client

Implements the Client interface and models a game of Sudoku.

newPuzzle Sequence Diagram

Author:
$Randall Booth, James Comish, Rick Neff, Michael Ricks$
See Also:

exitGame

public void exitGame()
Exits the game on behalf of a Player who leaves early. This method will inform the Server that this Player should be removed from the Server's Client list.
